channel.title: Main on Prog'z
channel.description: Recent content in Main on Prog'z

item.title: About Me
item.description: About me Me in a nutshell Main languages : - C++ - C# - C - Python - Java What I'm good at : - Rendering (OpenGL / Vulkan) (GLSL / HLSL) - Engine Tools & Architecture - Algorithms (leetcode / france ioi) - Making games (Unity / Unreal Engine 4/5) - GUI (+ optimizations) - Multithreading - Networking - Artificial Intelligence I can also do some other things, contact me if you're interested!

item.title: Projects
item.description: Main Projects (Almost) all Projects 3D Animations Making 3D bone animations See code See more AI Movement Moving groups of AIs See code See more Aphrodite's Rendering Engine Tutorials to make a Rendering Engine with Vulkan See code See more Bim!Ball A brawler game Play See code See more Chess Multi A chess game playable in lan See code See more Distorsion A puzzle game where you control time Play See code See more Dragon Chess A live tutorial to make a chess game with Blueprints on Unreal Engine 4 See code See more Dragon Tower A simple platformer game made on Unreal Engine 4 Play See code See more Forest An introduction to Tech Art Play See code See more France IOI Algorithm resolutions & explainations See code See more GP Engine A custom Engine made from C++, with a game Play See code See more Ghosty A tamagotchi-like game, with an AI you have to take care of Play See code See more Gladiator Fight in an arena vs a coordinated AI group See code See more Janus Task System std::function remade See code See more Labyrinth Z A randomly generated labyrinth in Python See more Magnum Using the Magnum engine to make a game See code See more Malloc And Free Custom implementation of Malloc and Free See code See more Memory Soup Library making big memory improvements See code See more Minecraft Plugins Java plugins for Minecraft See code See more Minestorm A game with custom 2D collisions See code See more MiniMax An AI for board games See code See more NeuralNetwork Development of a neural network in C# See code See more Nintendo Switch Port Programming on a Nintendo Switch See code See more Padoru Game C++ SDL Tutorials See code See more Physics Engine 2D Collisions for convex objects See more Projection 2.
